#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
while(1){
int t;
cin>>t;
 if(t>=0)
    {
       int a[100]={};
       int q,r,i=0,temp;
       q=t;
       temp=t;
       while(q>=7)
       {
          r=q%7;
          a[i]=r;
          i++;
          q=q/7;
          temp=q;
       }
       a[i]=temp;
       while(i>=0)
       {cout<<a[i];i--;}

       cout<<endl;

    }
    else
        break;
}
return 0;
}
